  • java.lang.Object

extends ScotlandYard

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScotlandYardModel

        public ScotlandYardModel(int numberOfDetectives,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> rounds,
                         java.lang.String graphFileName)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new ScotlandYardModel object.
        Parameters:
        numberOfDetectives - the number of detectives.
        rounds - the List of booleans denoting when Mr X is visible.
        graphFileName - the path to the file containing the graph data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws when it can't read the graph file.
